sense.name: the compartment portion of a mechanical conveyance
sense.examples: A fighter jet collided with a cable car going up the mountain at a famous ski resort. People traveled in elegance in the cars of the great zeppelins such as the Hindenburg. This is the local elevator, let's wait for the express car to the 40th floor.

sense.name: transport vehicle that operates under its own power
sense.examples: John took Mary for a joy ride in his ticket-me-officer-red sports car. The police reported a car going out of control near an exit off 495. In that sci-fi film people fly around in their cars instead of driving on roads.

sense.name: a wheeled conveyance pulled by a locomotive
sense.examples: J.P. Morgan had his own luxuriously-appointed rail car. These freight cars will need two engines to haul them. The hobo jumped quickly onto the slowly moving flat car.
